thumb.title: Lizard Cases LLC
thumb.description: Lizard Cases LLC is Raleigh’s trusted mobile repair and accessories shop, offering fast, professional service since 2021. Located at 1239 Buck Jones Rd, we provide same-day repairs for cracked screens, battery replacements, and charging port issues—no appointment needed. Our certified technicians use high-quality parts and work on all major brands including Apple, Samsung, Google, and Sony.Beyond repairs, Lizard Cases LLC stocks a wide variety of durable phone cases, screen protectors, chargers, and cables to keep your device protected and powered. With a try-before-you-buy approach and a no-pressure environment, we make mobile shopping simple and stress-free.Whether you're a student needing a quick fix or a professional looking to upgrade your gear, we're here to help. Our local team is known for honest service, fast turnaround, and friendly support.📍 Visit us at 1239 Buck Jones Rd, Raleigh, NC 27606 🌐 Explore: https://lizardcases.com 📞 Call: (919) 264-3258 🛠️ Request repair: https://lizardcases.com/repair-request-formLizard Cases LLC – Expert repairs. Quality gear. No hassle.
